name: SleepyGraffiti
description:
Player Abilities:

Parry - Reflects projectiles back at opponents!

Dash - has invincibility frames to help dodge attacks!

Controls ------------------------------- Keyboard and Gamepad supported

  • Arrow Keys/ D - Pad to move
  • Spacebar / X button to jump
  • Z key /Circle Button to Parry Projectiles
  • C Key / L1 Button to Dash (dodges through attacks)

Story:

You play as a Robinhood-esque thief that steals gems from the rich to give to the poor. Your leaving the palace after a heist and a Slime guardian is sent by the Palace Lord to stop you. Defeat it and spread the wealth!

Credits:

- Programming / Music  / sfx -> Slaps: https://twitter.com/DwayneDev_

- Art / Animation -> Goki: https://twitter.com/Gokiberri
